alert.note: Alert for Delaware Beaches; Inland Sussex (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 10:13AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sussex County through 1045 AM EDT... At 1012 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Millville, or 12 miles southeast of Georgetown, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dagsboro, Millville, Henlopen Acres, Long Neck, Ocean View and Dewey Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
